comment: I loved Prof. Lewis! I feel like I actually learned in her class. All of the assignments were done in class except one. The expectations for each assignment are very clear. She is kind of a strict grader, but I believe that it is easy to get an A on each assignment if you try. I would highly recommend taking her!

I really enjoyed this class & the variation of assignments in class. The class is a mix of lecture, group work, Kahoots and table work. Most of the work is done in class so there is not a lot of outside time spent on the course. Easy course if you just do the work.

I look forward to her class every week! She makes the 3 hours somehow fly by and gives us work in class in a variety of ways, from group work to Kahoots. She has small activities in class that aren't "serious," but we always learn something from them. She loves answering our questions and hearing from us. She's very down-to-earth and amazing!

I loved this professor she is so sweet!! Assignments are mostly done in class so little to no home work, attendance is mandatory but i thought class was kinda fun! she didnt give the best feedback but i ended with a good grade so its ok!
